title: Algebra Builder
description: Drag and drop algebraic items into their correct category: Variable, Constant, Expression, or Equation.

categories.name: Variable
categories.description: Letters or symbols that represent unknown or changing quantities

categories.name: Constant
categories.description: Fixed numerical values that do not change

categories.name: Expression
categories.description: Mathematical statement with numbers, variables, and operations but no equal sign

categories.name: Equation
categories.description: Mathematical statement with an equal sign showing two expressions are equal

instructions: Choose the number of expressions you want to solve.
Your task is to drag each into the correct category.
Categories: Variable (letters), Constant (numbers), Expression (no =), or Equation (has =).
Drag items to their matching category boxes.
If you make a mistake, you can move items between categories.
When you finish, click Submit to see your results and score.
